1/* $NetBSD: mkmap.h,v 1.2 2017/02/14 01:16:45 christos Exp $ */
2
3#ifndef _MKMAP_H_INCLUDED_
4#define _MKMAP_H_INCLUDED_
5
6/*++
7/* NAME
8/* mkmap 3h
9/* SUMMARY
10/* create or rewrite Postfix database
11/* SYNOPSIS
12/* #include <mkmap.h>
13/* DESCRIPTION
14/* .nf
15
16 /*
17 * Utility library.
18 */
19#include <dict.h>
20
21 /*
22 * A database handle is an opaque structure. The user is not supposed to
23 * know its implementation. We try to open and lock a file before DB/DBM
24 * initialization. However, if the file does not exist then we may have to
25 * acquire the lock after the DB/DBM initialization.
26 */
27typedef struct MKMAP {
28 DICT_OPEN_FN open; /* dict_xx_open() */
29 struct DICT *dict; /* dict_xx_open() result */
30 void (*after_open) (struct MKMAP *); /* may be null */
31 void (*after_close) (struct MKMAP *); /* may be null */
32 int multi_writer; /* multi-writer safe */
33} MKMAP;
34
35extern MKMAP *mkmap_open(const char *, const char *, int, int);
36extern void mkmap_append(MKMAP *, const char *, const char *);
37extern void mkmap_close(MKMAP *);
38
39#define mkmap_append(map, key, val) dict_put((map)->dict, (key), (val))
40
41extern MKMAP *mkmap_dbm_open(const char *);
42extern MKMAP *mkmap_cdb_open(const char *);
43extern MKMAP *mkmap_hash_open(const char *);
44extern MKMAP *mkmap_btree_open(const char *);
45extern MKMAP *mkmap_lmdb_open(const char *);
46extern MKMAP *mkmap_sdbm_open(const char *);
47extern MKMAP *mkmap_proxy_open(const char *);
48extern MKMAP *mkmap_fail_open(const char *);
49
50typedef MKMAP *(*MKMAP_OPEN_FN) (const char *);
51typedef MKMAP_OPEN_FN (*MKMAP_OPEN_EXTEND_FN) (const char *);
52extern void mkmap_open_register(const char *, MKMAP_OPEN_FN);
53extern MKMAP_OPEN_EXTEND_FN mkmap_open_extend(MKMAP_OPEN_EXTEND_FN);
54

65
66#endif
